attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i seen in the paper not long ago that british soldiers will not be allowed to wear there uniforms, This is because muslims are complaining i aint being racist but just because it's affensive to muslims doesen't meen our soldiers who are fighting every day for us shoulden't be allowed to wear there uniforms in public like i said i,m not being racist but it's our country not there's please sign this if you aggree.

rejection.details: Overlaps with the following petition: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/rafuniforms/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
